question: How can I apply for an internship at CMLI?
answer: You can apply by Checking the CMLI website for internship openings.Submitting an application through the university research department.Contacting faculty members for research assistant positions.Contact through Mail cmli_research@avinuty.ac.in

question: Who are the faculty members of CMLI?
answer: CMLI consists of expert faculty members. The full faculty list can be found on the CMLI website.You can check in the People Menu in cmli website.

question: What are the primary objectives of CMLI?
answer:
CMLI aims to:
•	To provide a platform to exchange and enhance knowledge in AI.
•	To provide technical training to students in the focus areas of AI.
•	To motivate and guide students to participate in competitions.
•	To take up industry defined problems and provide solutions.
•	To spread awareness among students about AI technology for nation building.

question: How can I join CMLI as a student or researcher?
answer: You can apply through Avinashilingam University’s admission portal and express interest in AI/ML research.

question: Where can I find research publications from CMLI?
answer: CMLI publishes research papers in journals and conferences. You can check the CMLI website for details.

question: Has CMLI organized any programs on Artificial Intelligence in education?
answer: Yes, CMLI, in collaboration with the Association of Indian Universities - Avinashilingam Institute - Academic & Administrative Development Centre (AIU-AI-AADC), organized a Short-Term Capacity Building Programme titled Artificial Intelligence in Education" from June 19th to June 30th
link: 2023. The program featured sessions on various AI applications in education

question: What collaborations has CMLI engaged in?
answer: CMLI has collaborated with various institutions to enhance its research capabilities. Notably, it has partnered with the Department of Agricultural Microbiology at Tamil Nadu Agricultural University (TNAU), Coimbatore, on a sponsored project titled Microbial Consortia and its Biomolecules (mVOC) in Rice Ecosystem." This project
link: funded by Organova Bio-Agriculture Pvt. Ltd.

question: What is the Certificate Course on  offered by CMLI?
answer: The Certificate Course on Augmented Reality & Virtual Reality is a specialized training program offered by CMLI. It aims to equip students and professionals with hands-on knowledge and skills in AR & VR technologies. To register

question: What are the recent awards and recognitions received by students and faculty at CMLI?
answer: Students and faculty at CMLI have won multiple awards, including Best Paper Awards, Research Excellence Awards, and Innovation Prizes in national and international conferences.

question: Were there any notable awards or recognitions at ICAI 2022?
answer: Yes, Dr. M. Krishnaveni and Mrs. V. Narmadha won the Best Paper Award for their research on Sustainable Mushroom Cultivation using AI.

question: What is the CMLI Learning Management System (LMS)?
answer: CMLI LMS is an online platform that offers courses on Artificial Intelligence, Research Methodology, and Digital Intelligence through Moodle and WordPress.

question: What fields does CMLI focus on?
answer: The centre focuses around Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning and Deep Learning and its application in the domain of Health care, Agriculture, Smart cities, Education, Transport etc.
